data.title: CHILI TAP ROOM
data.meta_description: Address: 3420 Chili Avenue Rochester, NY 14624 Phone: 585-889-8260 Hours: Sunday - Thursday: 11:00am to 10:00pm Friday Saturday: 11:00am to 11:00pm General Mana
data.text:
Hours:

Sunday - Thursday: 11:00am to 10:00pm

Friday & Saturday: 11:00am to 11:00pm

General Manager:

Todd Troutman

The New Tap Room at Bill Gray's in Chili

Come check out the new Sports Bar. Stop in with family and friends and enjoy Rochester's Best Burger and your favorite adult beverage. Stick around and watch the game on one of our 23 big screen high definition TV's. Play a game of darts, challenge your friends or family to a game of Pool, or try you luck at game of Quick Draw or play Lotto. You've gotta come. We look forward to seeing you!

What's on Tap...

We have a fantastic selection of Domestic, Imported, and locally brewed Craft Beer on Tap. Let us pour you a pint of your favorite brew or help you find a new favorite by trying a 4 beer flight!

Our selection of Craft Beer changes often...So check back to see what we have on tap for you!

Check us out on...

OR

Tap Here for a description of our draft beer selection!

Party Room:

Yes (When we are back at 100% capacity). We now have a great room to hold your special event. it can accommodate up to 50 guests or open the sliding doors and let the fun spill out into the Tap Room! Call for more information or to book your next event.

THE NFL SUNDAY TICKET...

Yup, We have that! Follow your favorite team every week on one of our 23 big screen TV's.
